en: I don’t know if you can read this, but I want you to know I made it! Uh… maybe I don’t quite know where I am yet. But it’s better than where I was before, in a world that wasn’t meant for me. I hope you will be happy! I’ll be happy too, as long as I have my will.
cn: 我不知道你是否能讀到這封信，但我想讓你知道我成功了！呃……也許我還不知道自己在哪裡,，但這總比那個不屬於我的世界裡面要好。你一定要過得開心！我也會過得很好的，只要我還有我的意志。
